text: nænxn cea ca phb wa hmu chn thi pen satru xan runræng kæ brrda phu thi sraththa nan khux chaw yiw læa brrda phu thi hı mi pha khi kæ xallxhˌ læa nænxn cea ca phb wa brrda phu thi mi khwam rak khır kæ brrda phu thi sraththa kıl kwa phwk khea nan khux brrda phu thi klaw wa thæcring phwk rea pen khrist nan k pheraawa nı hmu phwk khea nan mi brrda nakprachy læa bathhlwng læa k pheraawa phwk khea mi yexhying
